title: Proper banner rendering - Same Screen
custom_preconds: Never seen a film room banner before
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Scores Screen
2. Tap on a game to navigate to Gameday Videos
3. Observe the banner
4. Go back to the previous screen
5. Go back to Gameday videos
6. Observe the banner
custom_expected:
The first time, the banner is large.
The second time, the banner is small.

title: Proper banner rendering - Mutli Screen
custom_preconds: Never seen film room banners yet
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the screen for this section (Game Day, Team Videos, Videos News Index)
2. Observe the banner
3. Navigate to one of the other two screens
4. Observe the banner
5. Navigate to the last unvisited screen
6. Observe the baner
custom_expected:
The first time the banner is seen, it should be large.
All subsequent visits, it should be small.
